name: Rysen Dawn
description:
Rysen Dawn

Developed by: R-USER Games & yPER Studios

Description:

Rysen Dawn is an exciting & colorful game to experience parkour run in your device.

In this game you'll play as RYSEN, he's a live streamer who telecast his parkour skills & getting revenue from it.
You have a chance to become popular live streaming parkour master.
Show your best parkour moves to your in-game followers. 

Features & Highlights:
• Next-Gen Mobile graphics.
• Comfortable on-screen controllers.
• Listen to your favourite music using in-game emote system.
• You can Dance & do simple parkour trick using in-game emote system.
• Interact with NPCs.
• In-game Photo Mode.
• Get sponsors for your live streams to earn in-game money.
• You can run this game on 60FPS.

Inputs:
• Movement - W,A,S,D (or) Up,Left,Down,Right
• Sprint - Left Shift
• Crouch/Slide - C
• Parkour - Space Bar
• Emote Wheel - Tab
• Toggle Comments - Q
• Interact - E
• Help - H
• Pause - Escape

Photo Mode:
• Screenshots are stored in Documents/R-USER Games/Rysendawn/Screenshots
• Resolutions doesn't affect your screenshots. Ex: If you take screenshot (using photo mode) in 30% resolution, It automatically convert it to 100% Resolution.

Music:
• Store your music in Documents/R-USER Games/Rysendawn/Musics
• It can only load *.mp3 files.
• There will be a button to load music in top right after enabling headphones in emote wheel. 
• You must unlock and equip headphones before loading music.

www.rusergames.com
